kDesc
The bottom half of a yukata with waves and plovers decorated on white fabric.\nDefensive Strength: ★\nStylishness: ★★[#Legal]

Parte inferior de un yukata de tela blanca con olas y chorlitos.\nDefensa: ★\nBuen gusto: ★★[#Legal]
